data.message: How do I stop game requests?

replies.message: Hey Amberly. When you block an app or game, it won't be able to access any of your Facebook information or send you any requests. If you no longer want an app or game to contact you, please remove it. To learn how to remove an app, please visit our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/121070141307903. You may also block app invites from a specific friend: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/103933853029263. Hope this helps! -Hailey
